alert.note: Alert for Coastal Dixie; Inland Dixie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 6:23AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Dixie County through 715 AM EDT... At 622 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of Fowlers Bluff, or 13 miles south of Cross City, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cross City, Horseshoe Point, Suwannee, Horseshoe Beach, Shamrock, Cross City Airport, Shired Island, Old Town, Eugene, Yellow Jacket and Fanning Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
